citation: Proclamation under the Forest Practices Amendment (Administrative Reform) Act 2004 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Forest Practices Amendment (Administrative Reform) Act 2004

I, the Administator in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Forest Practices Amendment (Administrative Reform) Act 2004 fix 1 July 2005 as the day on which that Act commences.

22 June 2005

E. C. CRAWFORD

Administrator

By His Excellency's Command,

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Infrastructure, Energy and Resources

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 June 2005

This proclamation is administered by the Forest Practices Board.
